name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The New York Times (nytimes) Read Aloud

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will try to insert a speak button in the beginning of the article. When you click the button, it will analyze all the readable text in the article and then trying to read aloud the text using local text-to-speech service in the operating system.

You need to buy a license to use this chrome extension. It is one time purchase of USD $10.
